Text: Doesn't seem to work for Droid. Says "The Swype package you installed does not match screen size of the device. Please contact Swype about this issue. Screen size 480x854."
@Vandalay The description says it's for HVGA devices. The Droid is not an HVGA device.

Trial software. Verified that it works though. Will display a pop up saying trial period has expired. trying to use the keyboard again will cause it to force close.

HTC Magic
